db:abstract.db:para: The ForeachInfo class represents a foreach construct.
This struct was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: QScxmlExecutableContent::StringId ForeachInfo::array
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the name of the array that is iterated over

db:section.db:title: QScxmlExecutableContent::StringId ForeachInfo::context
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the context for evaluating the expression

db:section.db:title: QScxmlExecutableContent::StringId ForeachInfo::index
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the name of the index variable

db:section.db:title: QScxmlExecutableContent::StringId ForeachInfo::item
db:section.db:para: This variable holds the name of the iteration variable
